title: Trump raises tariff hikes on South Korea
shortDescription: President Donald Trump threatened to hike tariffs on South Korea, saying the country isn't living up to a trade agreement.

title: Trump says he closes eyes because of 'boring as hell' Cabinet meetings
shortDescription: President Trump offered a new explanation for closing his eyes and appearing to fall asleep during Cabinet meetings: They're boring.

title: Nicki Minaj set to speak at Trump event
shortDescription: Nicki Minaj is listed as one of several speakers set to appear at an upcoming Treasury Department event to discuss Trump Accounts.

title: Daily Briefing: Trump's immigration plan on thin ice?
shortDescription: Trump's immigration approval rating drops, poll finds. Here is the news to know on Tuesday.

title: A $1 coin with Trump’s face? Inside the currency controversy.
shortDescription: The Treasury's decision to feature Trump's face on currency broke a longstanding tradition set by George Washington.

title: Who is Greg Bovino? Top Trump immigration enforcer to leave Minneapolis
shortDescription: Amid President Donald Trump’s immigration enforcement across the United States, Border Patrol Cmdr. Gregory Bovino has emerged as a central figure.

title: Will ICE raids hurt Republicans' chances in 2026 battlegrounds?
shortDescription: Wary Republicans are mapping the fallout, strategists say, but remain mostly wedded to Trump's enforcement plans in aftermath of two Minnesota deaths.

title: President Trump's immigration approval dips to new low, poll finds
shortDescription: Most Americans believe President Trump's policy on immigration is going too far, according to a new Reuters/Ipsos poll.

title: Trump officials pressure Minnesota on transgender sports
shortDescription: The announcement on transgender sports comes as Minnesota officials fight the Trump administration over immigration enforcement.

title: Trump and Walz talk immigration enforcement
shortDescription: President Donald Trump and Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz spoke on a "productive" call about immigration enforcement in Minneapolis.

title: Trump promotes first lady's 'Melania' doc as 'must watch'
shortDescription: The film will be available to stream on Amazon Prime the same day as its theatrical release on Jan. 30.

title: 'Melania' movie details what Mrs. Donald Trump has done as first lady
shortDescription: Release date for Melania Trump's inauguration documentary, directed by Brett Ratner: Jan. 30, 2026. How the model met Donald to her gig as first lady.

title: Trump says Justice Department is investigating Rep. Ilhan Omar
shortDescription: President Trump said the Justice Department is investigating Rep. Ilhan Omar over the origins of the Minnesota Democrat's personal wealth.

title: Did Trump say 'only criminals carry guns’ after Alex Pretti shooting?
shortDescription: Amid backlash on the shooting of Alex Pretti, an apparently fabricated post shows Trump saying “only criminals carry guns.” What did he actually say?

title: Trump sends border czar Tom Homan to Minnesota after Alex Pretti killing
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said he's sending Tom Homan, the White House's border czar, to oversee immigration enforcement operations in Minnesota.

title: Greenland shuts down Trump on sovereignty for American bases
shortDescription: President Trump appears intent on gaining sovereignty over land in Greenland where American military bases are located. No way, Greenland says.

title: Israel retrieves last hostage body from Gaza in boost for Trump plan
shortDescription: Israel has retrieved the remains of the last remaining hostage held in Gaza, the military said on Monday.
